overview: A Two part Rockymentary By Andreas Sahlström  Part1: The history & ideas by the band, featuring interviews with members past & present.  Part2: Follows Oi Polloi on the "Ar Ceol, Ar Canan, Ar-a-mach" European Tour in 2006
tagline: A Two part Rockymentary By Andreas Sahlström
title: Oi Polloi – The Movie
